# React Post Pagination with React Query

This project implements a paginated post list using React Query and Tailwind CSS. The application demonstrates efficient data fetching, caching, and pagination state management.

## Project Structure
- Uses Create React App for React setup (no Vite)
- Functional components only (no class components)
- TypeScript for type safety
- React Query for data fetching and caching
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- JSONPlaceholder API for mock data

## Features
- Paginated post list with Previous/Next navigation
- Loading and error state handling
- Page caching for smooth navigation
- Skeleton loaders for better UX
- Prefetching for improved performance
- TypeScript integration
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS

## Development Notes
- All components use functional components with hooks
- React Query handles caching and background refetching
- Optimized for performance with proper memoization
- Clean and reusable code structure
